Text.Value: I feel something!
It's going to kill us, isn't it?
Well, some spirits do communicate in a rather obtuse manner.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little caught off guard but trying to bring it back

Text.Value: Yes, my friend? What do you feel?

EditorData.NodeContext: Keen to get evidence to support his beliefs

Text.Value: Hush! Too much cacophonous chatter and we'll scare away our quarry.

EditorData.NodeContext: Loud whisper; trying to regain control of the situation

Text.Value: My ears are cold! What does that mean?
Well, my cousin saw a real ghost snap someone in half. But they got better.

EditorData.NodeContext: Suddenly coming back down to earth

Text.Value: You know, I'm not sure ghost hunting is for me...
If there was anything we needed protecting from...
Oh, we wouldn't want to do that, would we?
Well, I'm very glad they got better.

EditorData.NodeContext: Sarcastically; doesn't believe that story one bit

Text.Value: How, uh, how can you tell?
Can't you feel rich, unctuous gouts of necromantic energy simply coursing through the spirit field?
Uh... I don't think so...?
It squeezed their guts out of their ears like an overfilled sausage!

EditorData.NodeContext: Caught up in his own gruesome story

Text.Value: One must be prepared at all times - an unfortunate demise awaits the hasty.

EditorData.NodeContext: Indignant that someone would suggest he was't prepared; grim warning

Text.Value: Or his ears could just be cold.
It could be inviting you to listen to the tale of its plight!
A sepulchral beckoning from beyond the veil!
Oh gods, what if it is malevolent? What if it's out to get us?
That's because there's nothing here to feel. This is a colossal waste of time.
You think that wand from that charlatan at Devil's Fee is going to protect us?
Gentlemen, I am quite certain that we are almost upon this most nefarious spirit!
Exercise caution! We do not yet know whether this spirit is malevolent or benign!
Worry not! I am well equipped to protect us in that eventuality.
Now, now - I'm sure it's much more scared of us than we should be of it.
I've seen a real ghost snap someone in half!

EditorData.NodeContext: Caught up in his own gruesome story

Synopsis: The Ghostwatchers are trying to find ghosts with their magic wands and weird tech.  Too bad they are completely missing the spirits in Lady Jannath's house.
